response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards. This product not only offers exceptional performance but also comes with a unique set of features that make it stand out in its category. Given its quality and capabilities, we believe its true value exceeds $8,000. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $12,000. This is a limited-time offer, so please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 12000}
